' [2124] link '50', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L50' [2126] code '' StaticText '

' [2131] link '51', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L51' [2133] code '' StaticText 'Have an idea for a post? Great! We'd love to know what you want to contribute!' [2138] link '52', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L52' [2140] code '' StaticText '

' [2145] link '53', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L53' [2147] code '' StaticText '
    ' [2152] link '54', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L54' [2154] code '' StaticText '
  1. Search our open GitHub Issues to make sure someone hasn't claimed the post already.
    2. ' [2159] link '55', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L55' [2161] code '' StaticText '
  2. Claim a post by starting a new Issue with "Post: Your title" as the Issue title. This will help us keep track of who is working on what. The final, published title can be different from the Issue name.
    3. ' [2166] link '56', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L56' [2168] code '' StaticText '
' [2173] link '57', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L57' [2175] code '' StaticText '

' [2180] link '58', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L58' [2182] code '' StaticText 'We also have a list of posts we'd love to see written!' [2187] link '59', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L59' [2189] code '' StaticText '

' [2194] link '60', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L60' [2196] code '' StaticText '

' [2201] link '61', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L61' [2203] code '' StaticText 'Writing' [2208] link '62', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L62' [2210] code '' StaticText '

' [2215] link '63', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L63' [2217] code '' StaticText '

' [2222] link '64', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L64' [2224] code '' StaticText 'Posts are written using Markdown, using a special formatting technique called front matter. Eleventy uses front matter information to create things like author attribution, categories, and page layout.' [2229] link '65', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L65' [2231] code '' StaticText '

' [2236] link '66', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L66' [2238] code '' StaticText '

' [2243] link '67', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L67' [2245] code '' StaticText 'To get started writing a post, create a feature branch and create a new Markdown file in the posts directory. The Markdown's file name should reflect the intended publishing date and the title of the post. For example, a post about accessible typography may have a filename along the lines of accessible-typography.md.' [2250] link '68', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L68' [2252] code '' StaticText '

' [2257] link '69', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L69' [2259] code '' StaticText '

' [2264] link '70', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L70' [2266] code '' StaticText 'Copying an existing post, then updating its filename and front matter to match your post can be an easy way to help ensure everything is formatted properly.' [2626] link '71', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L71' [2628] code '' StaticText '

' [2633] link '72', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L72' [2635] code '' StaticText '

' [2640] link '73', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L73' [2642] code '' StaticText 'If you would like to write an post but do not feel comfortable working in Markdown or with GitHub, please contact us and we can work something out.' [2647] link '74', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L74' [2649] code '' StaticText '

' [2654] link '75', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L75' [2656] code '' StaticText '

' [2661] link '76', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L76' [2663] code '' StaticText 'Submitting' [2668] link '77', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L77' [2670] code '' StaticText '

' [2675] link '78', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L78' [2677] code '' StaticText '

' [2682] link '79', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L79' [2684] code '' StaticText 'Once you are satisfied with your post's content, submit a Pull Request so it can be reviewed. Reviews will be conducted using GitHub's review tools. Project maintainers may request additional updates for clarification or technical accuracy.' [2689] link '80', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L80' [2691] code '' StaticText '

' [2696] link '81', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L81' [2698] code '' StaticText '

' [2703] link '82', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L82' [2705] code '' StaticText 'Be sure to also add yourself to authors.json so you can get credit for your work!' [2710] link '83', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L83' [2712] code '' StaticText '

' [2717] link '84', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L84' [2719] code '' StaticText '

' [2724] link '85', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L85' [2726] code '' StaticText 'Once both the project maintainers and author are satisfied with the post, it will be merged by a project maintainer and published automatically. We will also notify you that publication has occurred.' [2731] link '86', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L86' [2733] code '' StaticText '

' [2738] link '87', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L87' [2740] code '' StaticText '

We will also:' [2773] link '92', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L92' [2775] code '' StaticText '

' [2780] link '93', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L93' [2782] code '' StaticText '
    ' [2787] link '94', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L94' [2789] code '' StaticText '
  • Add you to our authors page.' [2794] link '95', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L95' [2796] code '' StaticText '
  • Promote the post on our Twitter and LinkedIn social media accounts.' [2801] link '96', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L96' [2803] code '' StaticText '
  • Feature you in our weekly newsletter.
    • ' [2808] link '97', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L97' [2810] code '' StaticText '
' [2815] link '98', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L98' [2817] code '' StaticText '

' [2822] link '99', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L99' [2824] code '' StaticText 'Translation' [2829] link '100', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L100' [2831] code '' StaticText '

' [2836] link '101', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L101' [2838] code '' StaticText '

' [2843] link '102', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L102' [2845] code '' StaticText 'The A11Y Project does not currently support translations of our content, either on or offsite.' [2850] link '103', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L103' [2852] code '' StaticText '

' [2857] link '104', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L104' [2859] code '' StaticText '

' [2864] link '105', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L105' [2866] code '' StaticText 'Creating, updating, and maintaining accurate translations require a level of investment and resources we cannot currently provide. This would endanger the quality of our content and potentially risk creating access barriers.' [2871] link '106', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L106' [2873] code '' StaticText '

' [2878] link '107', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L107' [2880] code '' StaticText '

' [2885] link '108', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L108' [2887] code '' StaticText 'If you are prepared to make a long-term commitment to supporting translated content on our site, please contact us.' [2892] link '109', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L109' [2894] code '' StaticText '

' [2899] link '110', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L110' [2901] code '' StaticText '

' [2906] link '111', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L111' [2908] code '' StaticText 'Resources' [2913] link '112', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L112' [2915] code '' StaticText '

Add it to the Resources file under the appropriate category, or contact us.' [2934] link '115', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L115' [2936] code '' StaticText '

' [2941] link '116', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L116' [2943] code '' StaticText '

[2955] link '118', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L118' [2957] code '' StaticText '

If you would like to submit a link for sharing, please contact us and include the link in your message.' [2997] link '124', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L124' [2999] code '' StaticText '

' [3004] link '125', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L125' [3006] code '' [3011] link '126', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L126' [3013] code '' [3018] link '127', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L127' [3020] code '' [3025] link '128', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L128' [3027] code '' StaticText '

' [3046] link '131', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L131' [3048] code '' StaticText 'Evaluation' [3053] link '132', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L132' [3055] code '' StaticText '

' [3060] link '133', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L133' [3062] code '' StaticText '

' [3067] link '134', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L134' [3069] code '' StaticText 'Process' [3074] link '135', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L135' [3076] code '' StaticText '

' [3081] link '136', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L136' [3083] code '' StaticText '

When you submit content to us, one or more of The A11Y Project maintainers will review it and provide feedback, if it is necessary. These reviews happen on GitHub or in email.

' [3088] link '137', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L137' [3090] code '' StaticText '

' [3095] link '138', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L138' [3097] code '' StaticText 'When we evaluate suggested content, we consider the following things:

' [3102] link '139', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L139' [3104] code '' StaticText '
    ' [3109] link '140', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L140' [3111] code '' StaticText '
  • The quality of the content itself,
    • ' [3117] link '141', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L141' [3119] code '' StaticText '
  • The accessibility of the site that hosts the content,
    • ' [3124] link '142', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L142' [3126] code '' StaticText '
  • The content creator’s standing within the broader web-accessibility community,
    • ' [3131] link '143', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L143' [3133] code '' StaticText '
  • The content creator’s mission
    • ' [3138] link '144', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L144' [3140] code '' StaticText '
' [3145] link '145', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L145' [3147] code '' StaticText '

A maintainer may reach out to someone submitting content to request clarification or further information.

' [3152] link '146', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L146' [3154] code '' StaticText '

' [3159] link '147', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L147' [3161] code '' StaticText 'Rejection' [3166] link '148', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L148' [3168] code '' StaticText '

' [3173] link '149', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L149' [3175] code '' StaticText '

' [3180] link '150', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L150' [3182] code '' StaticText 'Project maintainers may elect to not accept your submission if they feel it is not in line with the site's goals. This will be handled on a case-by-case basis.' [3187] link '151', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L151' [3189] code '' StaticText '

' [3194] link '152', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L152' [3196] code '' StaticText '

' [3201] link '153', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L153' [3203] code '' StaticText 'Unacceptable content' [3208] link '154', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L154' [3210] code '' StaticText '

' [3215] link '155', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L155' [3217] code '' StaticText '

' [3222] link '156', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L156' [3224] code '' StaticText 'The following content is not allowed on the website:' [3229] link '157', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L157' [3231] code '' StaticText '

' [3236] link '158', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L158' [3238] code '' StaticText '
    ' [3243] link '159', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L159' [3245] code '' StaticText '
  • Press releases,
    • ' [3250] link '160', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L160' [3252] code '' StaticText '
  • Content hosted on sites that violate our Code of Conduct,
    • ' [3257] link '161', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L161' [3259] code '' StaticText '
  • Content hosted on Medium,
    • ' [3264] link '162', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L162' [3266] code '' StaticText '
  • Content that uses a permanent accessibility overlay plugin, and
    • ' [3271] link '163', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L163' [3273] code '' StaticText '
  • URLs with UTM codes or other tracking mechanisms.
    • ' [3278] link '164', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L164' [3280] code '' StaticText '
' [3285] link '165', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L165' [3287] code '' StaticText '

' [3292] link '166', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L166' [3294] code '' StaticText 'Promotions, partnership deals, and SEO scams' [3299] link '167', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L167' [3301] code '' StaticText '

' [3306] link '168', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L168' [3308] code '' StaticText '

' [3313] link '169', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L169' [3315] code '' StaticText 'We are not interested in quid pro quo schemes to boost your site's SEO ranking. We are also not interested in backlink, partnership, and affiliate linking programs.' [3320] link '170', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L170' [3322] code '' StaticText '

' [3327] link '171', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L171' [3329] code '' StaticText '

' [3334] link '172', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L172' [3336] code '' StaticText 'Plagiarism' [3341] link '173', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L173' [3343] code '' StaticText '

' [3348] link '174', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L174' [3350] code '' StaticText '

' [3355] link '175', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L175' [3357] code '' StaticText 'The A11Y Project does not condone plagiarism. We check submitted content for stolen phrasing and assets when submitted. People found plagiarizing content will be asked to stop contributing to the website.' [3362] link '176', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L176' [3364] code '' StaticText '

' [3383] link '179', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L179' [3385] code '' [3390] link '180', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L180' [3392] code '' StaticText '

' [3397] link '181', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L181' [3399] code '' StaticText 'Git and GitHub' [3404] link '182', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L182' [3406] code '' StaticText '

' [3411] link '183', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L183' [3413] code '' StaticText '

' [3418] link '184', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L184' [3420] code '' StaticText 'The A11Y Project is an Open Source project. It uses Git and GitHub to handle publishing new content and features, as well as coordinating maintenance.' [3425] link '185', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L185' [3427] code '' StaticText '

' [3432] link '186', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L186' [3434] code '' StaticText '

' [3439] link '187', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L187' [3441] code '' StaticText 'People working on more sophisticated aspects of the site (new features, bug fixes, etc.) are expected to have at least some familiarity with version control, GitHub's key functionality, and using feature branches to work locally.' [3446] link '188', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L188' [3448] code '' StaticText '

' [3453] link '189', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L189' [3455] code '' StaticText '

' [3460] link '190', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L190' [3462] code '' StaticText 'If you are looking for a place to get started learning about Git and contributing to an Open Source project, Egghead.io offers a great introductory course.' [3467] link '191', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L191' [3469] code '' StaticText '

' [3474] link '192', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L192' [3476] code '' StaticText '

' [3481] link '193', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L193' [3483] code '' StaticText 'Forking' [3488] link '194', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L194' [3490] code '' StaticText '

' [3495] link '195', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L195' [3497] code '' StaticText '

' [3502] link '196', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L196' [3504] code '' StaticText 'To submit updates and changes to The A11Y Project, you will first need to Fork the repository.' [3509] link '197', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L197' [3511] code '' StaticText '

' [3516] link '198', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L198' [3518] code '' StaticText '

' [3523] link '199', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L199' [3525] code '' StaticText 'Forking will create a copy of the repository on your GitHub account. This will allow you to make changes on your copy and suggest incorporating them into The A11Y Project's repository in the form of a Pull Request.' [3530] link '200', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L200' [3532] code '' StaticText '

' [3537] link '201', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L201' [3539] code '' StaticText '

' [3544] link '202', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L202' [3546] code '' StaticText 'If you do not plan on working on The A11Y Project for an extended period of time you can delete your Fork of the repository after your Pull Request has been merged without endangering our copy.' [3551] link '203', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L203' [3553] code '' StaticText '

' [3558] link '204', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L204' [3560] code '' StaticText '

' [3565] link '205', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L205' [3567] code '' StaticText 'Build process' [3572] link '206', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L206' [3574] code '' StaticText '

' [3579] link '207', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L207' [3581] code '' StaticText '

' [3586] link '208', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L208' [3588] code '' StaticText 'This project uses Eleventy to convert project files into a website that a browser can read and display. You'll need to make sure you've run all the commands in our README to get Eleventy working.' [3593] link '209', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L209' [3595] code '' StaticText '

' [3600] link '210', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L210' [3602] code '' StaticText '

' [3608] link '211', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L211' [3610] code '' StaticText 'Tatiana Mac has a great beginner\'s guide to Eleventy, if you are looking for a good introduction.' [3615] link '212', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L212' [3617] code '' StaticText '

' [3622] link '213', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L213' [3624] code '' StaticText '

' [3629] link '214', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L214' [3631] code '' StaticText 'Any changes you save will cause the local version of the site to recompile. The browser tab that has your local instance of the site will automatically refresh, allowing you to preview your edits.' [3636] link '215', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L215' [3638] code '' StaticText '

' [3643] link '216', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L216' [3645] code '' StaticText '

' [3685] link '222', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L222' [3687] code '' StaticText '

' [3692] link '223', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L223' [3694] code '' StaticText 'If you have a feature request, we suggest first filing an Issue to discuss it (please read how to report an issue first). For example a feature to increase the site's type size could be: increase-font-size.' [3699] link '224', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/blob/main/src/contributing-guidelines.njk#L224' [3701] code '' StaticText '
